description:
Continue your vibrant adventure with more pages to color in. The DLC offers 18 new illustrations, taking you deeper into the forest, tropical Hawaii, and amazing Asia. Use your imagination and painting skills honed in the base game to bring them to life.

Iron your flannel and prepare your painting brush! Get ready for an incredible ride around the world in Coloring Pages: Lumberhill Tales. You decide the colors of each scene with a wide variety of colors, textures, brushes, and stamps.
name: Holidays DLC
